code: import axios from'axios';var API={searchGoogle:function searchGoogle(input){var queryString='https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?key=AIzaSyAIY4R3KJo33zPFCjFeSoMxrFgHZBHiuw4&q='+input;return axios.get(queryString);},getFavorites:function getFavorites(){console.log("this is the API");return axios.get('/api/books');},addtoFavorites:function addtoFavorites(postData){return axios.post('api/books',postData);},removeFavorites:function removeFavorites(id){return axios.delete('api/books/'+id);}};export default API;
